summary: Stack Teacher website project — an educational/teaching platform. Version 11 deployed to production with Refund & Cancellation Policy and updated branding. User requested a logo (icon/symbol + text wordmark) for 'Stack Teacher' with a tech-educational feel.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Horizontal logo combining a stacked-layers geometric icon (three offset rectangular blocks forming a tower, in teal/cyan accent on dark) with the wordmark 'Stack Teacher' in a clean sans-serif font — tech-educational, sharp, modern (stack-teacher-logo-horizontal.dim_400x100.png)
- Standalone icon-only version of the stacked-layers geometric mark from the Stack Teacher logo, same accent color, square format (stack-teacher-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Generate a Stack Teacher logo image combining an icon/symbol with a text-based wordmark. The icon should visually represent stacked layers or blocks (evoking knowledge stacks, tech layers, or curriculum phases). The wordmark should read 'Stack Teacher' in a clean, modern, professional font. The overall style must be tech-educational: sharp, credible, and forward-looking, using the existing site color palette (dark backgrounds with accent tones). Produce the logo in a horizontal layout (icon left, text right) and a standalone icon-only variant.

Integrate the generated Stack Teacher logo into the website's sticky header (Layout.tsx) to replace any existing text-only or placeholder brand mark. Use the horizontal (icon + wordmark) variant in the header. Ensure the logo is appropriately sized for the navbar, responsive on mobile (shrinks gracefully or uses icon-only variant on small screens), and links to the home page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Stack Teacher logo (icon/symbol + wordmark) with tech-educational style and integrate into website
